1.Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ 2.[Ẓa]rab, [...] to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr 3.they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Da[wsum] went forth 4.he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān 5.the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān has directed for his lord,] Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, [the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,] 2.[Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum bin Ẓa]rab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, [the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace(?)] 3.[.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when] they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Da[wsum] went forth, [and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at] 4.[Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān and] he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān [and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge] 5.[... ... and the passages(?) from the base to the top, by] the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, [in three months, the construction by 120 men.]

Ẓarab, ... to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr
they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth
he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān

Restored full text of the inscription:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān has directed for his lord, Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace?
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān and he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge
and the passages? from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by
men.
